text: 2:7 Josua 7:1Karmin otarim Akan,2:7 Ziar kam, “Akan,” a guizbangɨra gumazir kamɨn ziam. Ezɨ Hibrun akamɨn, ziar igharazim, “Akar,” an araremɨn mɨngarim kamaghɨn ghu, “Ikufi.” Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazir mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir kam osirizim, kamaghɨn an osiri, “Akar.” a Seran adarazir mav. Anarɨra bizir Israelia God bagha inabaziba ini. Ezɨ bizir kam bangɨn God osɨmtɨzim isa Israelia ganɨngi.
